Essentials.title: Raycast
Essentials.description: Advanced application launcher with extended features.

Essentials.title: Neovim
Essentials.description: Highly configurable and modernized Vim text editor.

General.title: Streaks
General.description: Habit tracker. Streaks is the to-do list that helps you form good habits. Every day you complete a task, your streak is extended. Choose or create up to 24 tasks, such as: walk the dog, floss your teeth, eat healthily, practice Spanish. Works with Apple Health.

General.title: Things
General.description: Things is the award-winning personal task manager that helps you plan your day, manage your projects, and make real progress toward your goals.

General.title: Proton
General.description: Secure email, VPN, and password manager.

General.title: Ghosttly
General.description: Ghostty is a fast, feature-rich, and cross-platform terminal emulator that uses platform-native UI and GPU acceleration.

Utilities.title: Stats
Utilities.description: Monitor system stats from your menu bar.

Utilities.title: CleanShot X
Utilities.description: Feature-rich screen capture tool with advanced editing and sharing options.

Utilities.title: IINA
Utilities.description: Modern, open-source media player for macOS with extensive format support.

Utilities.title: Synergy 3.0
Utilities.description: Control multiple devices with one keyboard and mouse.

Utilities.title: Clop
Utilities.description: Image, video, PDF and clipboard optimiser. Copy large, paste small, send fast.

Utilities.title: Dropover
Utilities.description: Effortless Drag & Drop on your Mac. Dropover is a macOS utility that makes Drag and Drop easier. Stash, gather or move draggable content without having to open side-by-side windows.

Creatives.title: Affinity Photo
Creatives.description: Professional photo editing software for creative enthusiasts.

Creatives.title: Affinity Designer
Creatives.description: Powerful vector graphic design software with a user-friendly interface.

Creatives.title: Affinity Publisher
Creatives.description: Robust desktop publishing software for multimedia projects.
